FuncDef: The display observe user-defined-filter command displays a user-defined mirroring rule.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a user-defined rule.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8.

Examples: observer user-defined-filter 1 offset 10 value abcdabcd ffffffff
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check a user-defined mirroring rule, run the display observe user-defined-filter command.
